articles.title: Supreme Court says Americans have right to carry guns in public - Philstar.com
articles.description: The US Supreme Court ruled Thursday that Americans have a fundamental right to carry a handgun in public, a landmark decision with far-reaching implications for states and cities across the country confronting a surge in gun violence.
